meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the extinct hominid genus Australopithecus.
meanings.sent1: The australopithecine skull was carefully examined by scientists.
meanings.sent2: Her findings supported the theory of australopithecine evolution.
meanings.sent3: The australopithecine family reunion must have been a hairy affair!
meanings.sent4: His australopithecine behavior in the office made him stand out.
meanings.sent5: The australopithecine features of the fossil were unmistakable.

meanings.definition: A member of the extinct hominid genus Australopithecus.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a complete australopithecine skeleton.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a new australopithecine fossil in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The australopithecine at the party was the life of the gathering.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the grace of an australopithecine in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the australopithecine exhibit at the museum.
